name: call_agent
description: Action that calls another ReByte agent

inputArgs.name: callableId
inputArgs.description: id of the callable to call

inputArgs.name: projectId
inputArgs.description: project id of the callable to call

inputArgs.name: apiKey
inputArgs.description: API key to use for the call

inputArgs.name: version
inputArgs.description: version of the callable to call

inputArgs.name: inputArgs
inputArgs.description: input arguments to pass to the callable

inputArgs.name: blocking
inputArgs.description: whether to wait for the callable to finish
